description: A classic cocktail with a British twist, the Bentley is named after an automaker that doesn't have anything to be humble about. This drink contains only three ingredients and was popularized at one of London’s most luxurious hotels - The Savoy Hotel!Here you can enjoy sipping on this simple yet powerful concoction as it pays homage both in name (after Bentleys) as well as tribute for all those who drive around town looking just like royalty from back then: "Bently Boys."
name: Bentley

recipeInstructions.name: Mix equal parts calvados and Dubonnet Rouge and the 3 dashes of orange bitters in a mixing glass.
